text: Photo Credit : ExcslusiveAccess. Net In Miami, there ’ s always a reason to celebrate and Thursday, December 7th was certainly no exception. Kicking off Art Basel weekend, the Eden Roc Miami Beach Hotel dazzled with celebrities, musicians, artists, philanthropists and other distinguished guests as The Global Gift Gala returned to the Magic City. In a night filled with passionate speeches, star - studded musical performances, a champagne reception and art auction, this charitable gala brought together hundreds of A - listers. Global Gift Foundation Honorary Chairs Eva Longoria Bastón and Ricky Martin lead the event as they came together to raise money for hurricane recovery efforts in struggling Puerto Puerto.
